title: Decision support training for chronic kidney disease dyads: the ImPart Study protocol.
abstract: Individuals living with stage 4 chronic kidney disease and their caregivers face multiple health-related decisions as the disease progresses. The ImPart (Improving the decision-making PARTnership of chronic kidney disease dyads), community-informed, factorial pilot trial intervention aims to train members of the dyad in skills to enhance decision support for patients. This single-site pilot 2 This protocol outlines a pilot factorial trial, guided by the multiphase optimization strategy, to evaluate a community-engaged, co-developed decision-support intervention for individuals with stage 4 chronic kidney disease and their caregivers. NCT06173323.
